archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Provide Earned Loyalty Program Reward Notification
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Provide a notification to the Earn Loyalty Program Reward process if earning loyalty program currency qualifies a program participant for a reward.

properties.value: Provide Earned Loyalty Program Reward Notification provides a notification to the Earn Loyalty Program Reward process if earning loyalty program currency qualifies a program participant for a reward. For example, after watching a certain number of videos a loyalty program participant can view one video free.
